Name: Ptah-Sokar-Osiris statuette
Description: Figure with a light blue striated wig and double feathered crown, featuring a light blue bead net with red dots on an ochre background. The large ornate collar with rows of rosettes and tubes is deep-set. The shoulder pieces consist of large falcon heads with red sun discs. The front and the back each have a column of pseudo-hieroglyphs, a would-be offering formula for Osiris.The Ptah-Sokar-Osiris statuette is standing on a pedestal with a tomb-shaped top.
